CustomField.description: The Service Region. Use this in other fields when you need to choose the right value from a Claims custom setting. CLAIMSV2-880 -(21-5-2020) , CLAIMSV2-960-(28-5-2020)
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Sector__c, "Decra"), 'Decra', IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Account.BillingCountryCode , "US"), ISPICKVAL(Sector__c, "US") ), 'US' , IF(AND( ISPICKVAL(Account.BillingCountryCode , "CA"), OR ( ISPICKVAL(Account.BillingStateCode, "AB"), ISPICKVAL(Account.BillingStateCode, "BC"), ISPICKVAL(Account.BillingStateCode, "SK"), ISPICKVAL(Account.BillingStateCode, "NT"), ISPICKVAL(Account.BillingStateCode, "YT"), ISPICKVAL(Account.BillingStateCode, "NU"), ISPICKVAL(Account.BillingStateCode, "MB") ) ), 'Western Canada' , 'Eastern Canada' ) ) )
CustomField.label: Conga: Service Region
